title: Business Analyst
content:
If you shop online (and who doesn’t these days?), then chances are you’ve already interacted with Yotpo. We’re a leading eCommerce retention marketing platform, on a mission to help brands of all sizes turn one-time shoppers into customers for life. Loyalty programs, SMS and email marketing, subscriptions, and reviews are our bread and butter, but we have more solutions up our sleeve, too.
We have teams across the world, including the US, Canada, UK, Israel, Bulgaria, and Australia — and we’re still growing. Our primary goal is to deliver the best technology in the industry.
You can hear all about it in our latest brand video. 
Sounds exciting? Then read on, because we’re in pursuit of the best and the brightest minds to help us achieve our vision.We are looking for a Business Analyst to join our Center of Excellence(COE) Analytics team. We are a group of fun, curious, strategic thinkers, who love working together to help guide our business growth as much as we love hanging out together.Our Technologies: SQL, Tableau, DBT, G-Sheet, SalesforceWhat we offer:

A constantly growing environment and meaningful, high-impact work
All the tools, training, and support you need for success
A great team of people who are passionate about eCommerce and data
An innovative culture that fuels personal growth

You’ll be:

Defining and measuring Business & Financial KPIs
Analyzing large, complex data sets to uncover insights and help translate them into actionable recommendations
Monitoring and sharing insights on the performance of our various business functions
Building and maintaining data analysis and reporting dashboards
Working with cross-functional teams - from senior management to finance teams, Go-to-market, data infra and product

Your experience:

2+ years of experience working as a Business/Data/Product Analyst or a similar role at an internet company
BA/BSc in Industrial Engineering and Management,  Information Systems Engineering, Economics, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field 
Advanced SQL skills
Experience with at least one BI tool: Tableau, Looker, Qlikview, etc. 
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
High level of English
Experience with DBT-- an advantage 
Experience working at a SaaS company - an advantage 
Statistical knowledge and experience using statistics for analyzing datasets - an advantage
